{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Tenda |model=AC18 |series=AC1900 |upc=885397270782 |asin=B01N6ETMVT |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |fcc_date=09/13/2016 |fcc_id=V7TAC18 |ic_id=9034A-AC18 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel plug |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4708A0;BCM4708A0KFEBG; |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W29N01GVSCAA |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CB128M16FP |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4360;BCM4360KMLG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4360;BCM4360KMLG; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6649E;454, 649E, 616;3;,,, 5GHz WLAN Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85710-11;;3; |tp_firmware=Asuswrt-Merlin, FreshTomato |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=Tenda_XXXXXX, Tenda_XXXXXX_5G |default_ssid_regex=^Tenda_[A-F0-9]{6}(_5G)?$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 }} {{TagLine|AC1900 Smart Dual-Band Gigabit WiFi Router}} :[http://www.tendacn.com/en/product/AC18.html Product page]
